meta.job_title: NA Commercial Ops Technical Prod Owner

duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with senior leadership to identify opportunities and technology solutions, develop business cases, and gain alignment for technology investment and project decisions.
Own and drive delivery of a product roadmap, ensuring focus on business needs and establishing clear critical metrics in collaboration with Sales and Supply Chain business and IT teams.
Develop talent that can lead the successful delivery of modern approaches to build capabilities that create a competitive advantage for the company's brands.
Play a key role in identifying opportunities to improve current processes using automation technologies, system enhancements and enlisting support of peers and business partners.
Partner with the wider IT community to ensure all aspects of technology needs are considered in the selection and integration of new technologies.
Lead meetings with senior members of business organizations to drive strategic outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Technology, Engineering, Information Architecture, or Computer Science, or similar field experience
